title: Basil.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Basil. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Likewise

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Basil. 
I'm glad to finally meet you

title: Basil.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Basil.AddToEscapeQuest]]
[[Not really...|Basil.EndDialog]]

title: Basil.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
I'm hungry, did you sleep well?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
No

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Me neither

title: Basil.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Do the caves bother you as much as it does me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Kind of, yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Huh

title: Basil.Day4.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Mornin'

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey

title: Basil.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hey Emma, what were you doing before all this?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Oh, I was a farmer 

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Me too. Soybeans, what about you?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Wheat mostly
I dunno it's kind of hard to think about right now

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Ok, yeah.
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Basil.Day5.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Mornin' Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey Basil
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Basil.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hey again Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey Basil
How'd you end up here?
I mean, it's not like you walked here

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
....
Well if you must know, my last owner fuckin died

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Oh

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
It was kind of bittersweet, because I hated the bastard, we all did
but there was no way I was getting out of there
I guess I didn't expect to end up here
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Basil.Day6.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Mornin', again, Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey again Basil
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Basil.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey Basil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
ah fuck I hate it here, i hate talking 
what is there to even fucking talk about

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
I know, I know
why don't you tell me something about yourself

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Like what? Some kind of story.
I guess. Not like we have anywhere to go right now. 
I could tell you about the night my last owner died.
...actually, you know what, nevermind
<<CampEventController upgradeBagLevel>>
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Basil.Day7.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
......

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Basil.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey Basil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
So about last time, you know

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Your old owner, how he died?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Yeah well, I was never supposed to tell anyone
but I guess it doesn't matter now anymore

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
What? What do you mean?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
We killed him, Emma. He was the most horrible person I ever met
And we killed him in cold blood that night. 
I don't know why I feel bad about it, but I do.
And they never found out about it. It seemed like an accident.
And nobody talked either, so they just assumed he croaked.
but I still ended up here, so I guess the joke's on me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Basil...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
I'm not afraid of the caves anymore, Emma
I deserve this, I deserve what's coming to me
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>

title: Basil.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Hey Basil
How are you, uh, feeling?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
I did a lot of thinking about it, and you know
I'm glad he's dead. I'm glad we killed him.
My last owner
I don't know why but talking about it for the first time helped me process it a little

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
....
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>

title: Basil.Day9.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Hey Emma
Didn't you say your family had a bunch of debt?
And that's why you got sold? 
I feel like I've heard that

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
....Yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Same thing happened to me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Huh
Were you angry? did you feel like you had to put on a brave face?
I did. I wanted to scream the entire time.
My sister was supposed to get sold too, but she ran away

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
I was, yeah. I wanted to run too.
I didn't, i thought i had to sacrifice myself so the rest of the village wouldn't lose any more
but now, yeah, I wish I had run

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
I used to be angry at my sister too
but after a while, here, I don't anymore
I understood why she did

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
Maybe she's out there
maybe you'll run into her again

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
I hope so

[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
You want me to say something profound?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Go for it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_talking>>
something profound

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer basil_default_silent>>
Ha
[[....|Basil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Basil.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Basil>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes
